Articles.Content:
Hey, I need a new, fresh install of 1.0.2, since I messed up my old install and most of the mods I use aren't updated to 1.0.4, and they've taken 1.0.2 off of the site.

Thanks in advance.
Sorry, but you can't. Unless you can fix your old install there's no way to get it. Maybe you can identify the bad files and ask some people to send them to you.
Hmmm... I'm pretty sure I had a seperate install, but deleted it. I'm gonna go look in bin for it.
Have you actually found any mods that were not compatible? Since it's just a miner update I don't think there would be any issues.
Quite a few, actually. They were mostly smaller ones, but with these mods now than get a new version and wait. Also, I did find another version in my computers trash bin, which was unused IIRC.
